name: 楊侑倫
objective:
This course discuss mechanical behavior of materials from the points of view of mechanics and material science. At the macro level, stress-strain analysis and plastic deformations and material models will be discussed. At the micro level, the mechanisms that control the mechanical behavior of materials will be discussed.

本課程以力學及材料科學的觀點探討材料的機械行為。巨觀上的應力應變分析、塑性變形及材料模型，以及材料機械行為的微觀機制將會被討論。
schedule:
Introduction (week 1)
1. Structure and Deformation in Materials (week 2-3)
2. A Survey of Engineering Materials (week 4-5)
3. Mechanical Testing methods (week 6-7)
-------Mid-term Exam------- (week 8)
4. Stress-strain relationships (week  9-11)
5. Fracture mechanics (week 12-13)
6. Theory of plasticity (week 14-16)
-------Final Exam------- (week 17)
